          <title>
            <string language="en">Filtering with filter paper</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Entstörung mit Filterpapier</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Filtrage avec le papier filtre</string>

            <string language="en">This illustration shows a filter paper that is used to separate solid particles from liquid.</string>

          </description>

            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre un papier filtre qui
